Todos for March

Joints

  • Missing types :
    • Prismatic ( Can be articulated by PJD6 ) Done
    • Point in Plane ( Can be articulated by PJD6 ) Done
    • Point on Line ( Can be articulated by PJD6 ) Done
  • Joint creating by using attributes, missing support for :
    • PJPulley Rejected
    • PJCylindrical Done
    • PJD6 Rejected
    • PJPointInPlane Done
    • "Point on Line" Done
  • User created attribute types for creating multi - link joints is buggy Done
